Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'
